main_definition: To perceive or become aware of someone or something using the eyes, often used metaphorically to express understanding.

meanings_and_examples.example: I can see the beautiful sunset from my window.
Once I saw why he was acting that way, it made more sense to me.
I didn't see her at the party last night; she surprised us by showing up!

meanings_and_examples.definition: Predict an outcome based on previous knowledge
meanings_and_examples.example: Given his past behavior, I saw that he would be late to the meeting.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Ask someone for information or clarification
meanings_and_examples.example: Could you see if your manager is available for a quick question?
